definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: She returns not to untie her but just to add black tape to her gag and to put her into a hogtie.
sentences.chinese: 她返回不要解開她只是添加黑膠帶嘔吐，把她捆綁。

sentences.english: Use wire or tape to attach your silk flowers to the container.
sentences.chinese: 用鐵絲或膠帶附上您的絹花到容器。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a rubber belt box with a cutting knife, which belongs to the daily necessaries.
sentences.chinese: 具有切割刀的膠帶盒是屬於日常生活用品。

sentences.english: Black insulating tapes are familiar evidence at criminal sites.
sentences.chinese: 黑色絕緣膠帶是犯罪現場的常見物證。

sentences.english: Add extra layers of cardboard to the corners of your box and use plenty of Duct tape to hold it tight.
sentences.chinese: 在盒子的角落處添加幾層硬紙板，用大量膠帶纏牢。

sentences.english: This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.chinese: 這個旋鈕只是用通明膠帶牢固住的。

sentences.english: Beier will always be your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾膠帶永遠是您最好的選擇。

sentences.english: She gets hogtied again with rope and then I wrap her head with electrical tape.
sentences.chinese: 再次與她捆綁的繩子，然後我用絕緣膠帶包裹她的頭。

sentences.english: Put the adhesive tape in the hot temperature environments , test the tape adhesion time.
sentences.chinese: 膠帶試片語熱溫環境中，測試其膠帶粘着時間。

sentences.english: Put the adhesive tape in the hot temperature environments , test the tape adhesion time.
sentences.chinese: 膠帶試片語熱溫環境中，測試其膠帶粘着時間。

sentences.english: Seal tape shall not cover on the feeling hoes .
sentences.chinese: 蓋頂膠帶不可覆蓋導帶孔的部分。

sentences.english: The profile of the steel surface shall be measured with replica tape and a spring micrometer.
sentences.chinese: 鋼材表面的粗糙度應使用拓模膠帶和測微計來測量。

sentences.english: Don't forget to put some masking tape on the windows before you paint the frames.
sentences.chinese: 漆窗框時別忘了在玻璃窗上粘遮蔽膠帶。

sentences.english: Fold top flap down to the box, pulling tightly, and tape.
sentences.chinese: 把上面的翻蓋朝下折，拉緊，然後用膠帶粘住。

sentences.english: Calculation of curvature radius when the outside belt is not away from the rollers.
sentences.chinese: 按外側膠帶不離開託輥計算曲率半徑。
